person.persName: John C. Allison (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of David P. Allison and Mary Allison. Married to Fannie Matthews Allison in Hickman County, Kentucky, on January 3, 1861. Father of Rosetta Allison. Resident of Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Hickman County in 1850. Resident of Hickman County in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in Hickman County in 1860. Farmer in Hickman County in 1863.
